name: James Noodle
description:
Escape the kitchen

Collect all keys to open all locks to escape.

Avoid the bullets from the angry noodle chef!

Control James Noodle with right and left key
Jump with space-key.
Duck with down key.

Escape to quit game

You get directly into the action. No Title screen, sorry.  The level restarts when you get hit by a bullet or escape the kitchen.

Good luck.
